GeneDef.label: Psionic Ublocker
GeneDef.description: Psionic Unblocked Supers can access psycasts that they normally couldn't\n\nAny number of Superhero Psionic paths can be taken at the same time. The only limiting factor is metabolic efficiency.

GeneDef.label: Tribal Ublocker
GeneDef.description: These Psions have the neural hardware to be able to cast and maintain Tribal-based psycasts, no matter their background.\n\nAny number of Superhero Psionic paths can be taken at the same time. The only limiting factor is metabolic efficiency"
